AngleInDegrees.title: AngleInDegrees
AngleInDegrees.description: An integer number representing an angle in whole degrees between 0 and 359.

ApplicationRateValue.title: ApplicationRateValue
ApplicationRateValue.description: A measured or calculated value of the application rate of a substance.

applicationRate.title: applicationRate
applicationRate.description: A value of the rate of application of a substance expressed in kilogrammes per square metre.

AxleSpacing.title: AxleSpacing
AxleSpacing.description: The spacing details between the axle sets of an individual vehicle numbered from the front to the back of the vehicle.

axleSpacing.title: axleSpacing
axleSpacing.description: The spacing interval, indicated by the axleSpacingSequenceIdentifier, between the axles of an individual vehicle from front to back of the vehicle.

axleSpacingSequenceIdentifier.title: axleSpacingSequenceIdentifier
axleSpacingSequenceIdentifier.description: Indicates the sequence number of the interval between the axles of the individual vehicle from front to back (e.g. 1, 2, 3...). This cannot exceed (numberOfAxles -1) if the numberOfAxles is also given as part of the VehicleCharacteristics.

AxleWeight.title: AxleWeight
AxleWeight.description: The weight details of a specific axle on the vehicle.

axlePositionIdentifier.title: axlePositionIdentifier
axlePositionIdentifier.description: Indicates the position of the axle on the vehicle numbered from front to back (i.e. 1, 2, 3...). This cannot exceed the numberOfAxles if provided as part of VehicleCharacteristics.

axleWeight.title: axleWeight
axleWeight.description: The weight of the specific axle, indicated by the axleSequenceIdentifier, on the vehicle numbered from front to back of the vehicle.

maximumPermittedAxleWeight.title: maximumPermittedAxleWeight
maximumPermittedAxleWeight.description: The maximum permitted weight of this specific axle on the vehicle.

Base64Binary.title: Base64Binary
Base64Binary.description: Binary data in base 64 encoding, for example for image data.

Boolean.title: Boolean
Boolean.description: Boolean has the value space required to support the mathematical concept of binary-valued logic: {true, false}.

CalendarWeekWithinMonth.title: CalendarWeekWithinMonth
CalendarWeekWithinMonth.description: Specification of periods defined by relevant calendar weeks in a month, see ISO8601. Note: Calendar weeks start with Monday. First week is the week containing the first of the month.

applicableCalenderWeekWithinMonth.title: applicableCalenderWeekWithinMonth
applicableCalenderWeekWithinMonth.description: Calender week in month. See ISO8601.  "All weeks of the month" is expressed by not using the CalendarWeekOfMonth class. Note: Calendar weeks start with Monday. First week is the week containing the first of the month.

ComputationMethodEnum.title: ComputationMethodEnum
ComputationMethodEnum.description: Types of computational methods used in deriving data values for data sets.

ConcentrationKilogramsPerCubicMetre.title: ConcentrationKilogramsPerCubicMetre
ConcentrationKilogramsPerCubicMetre.description: Concentration defined in kilograms per cubic metre (equivalent to grams per litre under standard conditions).

ConcentrationMicrogramsPerCubicMetre.title: ConcentrationMicrogramsPerCubicMetre
ConcentrationMicrogramsPerCubicMetre.description: A measure of concentration defined in µg/m3 (micrograms/cubic metre).

CountryCode.title: CountryCode
CountryCode.description: EN ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 two-letter country code

CubicMetres.title: CubicMetres
CubicMetres.description: A volumetric measure defined in cubic metres.

DataValue.title: DataValue
DataValue.description: A data value of something that can be measured or calculated. Any provided meta-data values specified in the attributes override any specified generic characteristics such as defined for a specific measurement in the MeasurementSiteTable.

dataError.title: dataError
dataError.description: Indication of whether the value is deemed to be erroneous by the supplier (true = erroneous). If not present, the data value is assumed to be ok. This may be used when automatic fault detection information relating to sensors is available.

reasonForDataError.title: reasonForDataError
reasonForDataError.description: The reason why the value is deemed to be erroneous by the supplier.

accuracy.title: accuracy
accuracy.description: The extent to which the value is expected to be free from error, measured as a percentage of the data value. 100% means fully accurate.

computationalMethod.title: computationalMethod
computationalMethod.description: Method of computation which has been used to compute this data value.

numberOfIncompleteInputs.title: numberOfIncompleteInputs
numberOfIncompleteInputs.description: The number of inputs detected but not completed during the sampling or measurement period; e.g. vehicles detected entering but not exiting the detection zone.

numberOfInputValuesUsed.title: numberOfInputValuesUsed
numberOfInputValuesUsed.description: The number of input values used in the sampling or measurement period to determine the data value.

smoothingFactor.title: smoothingFactor
smoothingFactor.description: Coefficient required when a moving average is computed to give specific weights to the former average and the new data. A typical formula is, F being the smoothing factor: New average = (old average) F + (new data) (1 - F).

standardDeviation.title: standardDeviation
standardDeviation.description: The standard deviation of the sample of input values from which this value was derived, measured in the units of the data value.

supplierCalculatedDataQuality.title: supplierCalculatedDataQuality
supplierCalculatedDataQuality.description: A measure of data quality assigned to the value by the supplier. 100% equates to ideal/perfect quality. The method of calculation is supplier specific and needs to be agreed between supplier and client.

DateTime.title: DateTime
DateTime.description: A combination of integer-valued year, month, day, hour, minute properties, a decimal-valued second property and a time zone property from which it is possible to determine the local time, the equivalent UTC time and the time zone offset from UTC.

DayWeekMonth.title: DayWeekMonth
DayWeekMonth.description: Specification of periods defined by the intersection of days or instances of them, calendar weeks and months.

applicableDay.title: applicableDay
applicableDay.description: Applicable day of the week. "All days of the week" is expressed by non-inclusion of this attribute.

applicableMonth.title: applicableMonth
applicableMonth.description: Applicable month of the year.  "All months of the year" is expressed by non-inclusion of this attribute.

Decimal.title: Decimal
Decimal.description: A decimal number whose value space is the set of numbers that can be obtained by multiplying an integer by a non-positive power of ten, i.e., expressible as i × 10^-n where i and n are integers and n >= 0.

DirectionBearingValue.title: DirectionBearingValue
DirectionBearingValue.description: A measured or calculated value of direction as a bearing.

directionBearing.title: directionBearing
directionBearing.description: A value of direction expressed in terms of a bearing measured in whole degrees. Unless otherwise specified the reference direction corresponding to 0 degrees is North.

DirectionCompassEnum.title: DirectionCompassEnum
DirectionCompassEnum.description: Cardinal direction points of the compass.

DirectionCompassValue.title: DirectionCompassValue
DirectionCompassValue.description: A measured or calculated value of direction as a point of the compass.

directionCompass.title: directionCompass
directionCompass.description: A value of direction expressed in terms of points of the compass.

EmissionClassificationEuroEnum.title: EmissionClassificationEuroEnum
EmissionClassificationEuroEnum.description: Classification of emission according to the Euro emission classification (based on serveral amendments on 1970 Directive 70/220/EEC). Note htat vehicleType as well as fuelType are mandatory to provide to make this classification explicit.

emissionClassificationEuro.title: emissionClassificationEuro
emissionClassificationEuro.description: The minimum Euro emission classification the vehicle(s) have to comply with according to the 1970 Directive 70/220/EEC and its several amendments. Note that vehicleType and fuelType need to be provided in order to make this classification explicit.

emissionClassificationOther.title: emissionClassificationOther
emissionClassificationOther.description: Some other (probably locally defined) value(s) for emission classification.

emissionLevel.title: emissionLevel
emissionLevel.description: The low emission level of a vehicle.

Fault.title: Fault
Fault.description: Information about a fault relating to a specific piece of equipment or process.

faultCreationTime.title: faultCreationTime
faultCreationTime.description: The date and time at which the fault was originally recorded/reported.

faultLastUpdateTime.title: faultLastUpdateTime
faultLastUpdateTime.description: The date and time at which the fault information as specified in this instance was last updated.

faultImpactSeverity.title: faultImpactSeverity
faultImpactSeverity.description: The severity of the fault in terms of how it affects the usability of the equipment or the reliability of the data generated by the equipment.

faultUrgencyToRectify.title: faultUrgencyToRectify
faultUrgencyToRectify.description: The urgency to rectify the fault.

manufacturerFaultCode.title: manufacturerFaultCode
manufacturerFaultCode.description: A manufacturer specific code for the fault.

FaultSeverityEnum.title: FaultSeverityEnum
FaultSeverityEnum.description: Classification of the severity of faults.

FaultUrgencyEnum.title: FaultUrgencyEnum
FaultUrgencyEnum.description: Classification of the urgency to rectify a fault.

Float.title: Float
Float.description: A floating point number whose value space consists of the values m × 2^e, where m is an integer whose absolute value is less than 2^24, and e is an integer between -149 and 104, inclusive.

FloatingPointMetreDistanceValue.title: FloatingPointMetreDistanceValue
FloatingPointMetreDistanceValue.description: A measured or calculated value of distance in metres in a floating point format.

distance.title: distance
distance.description: A value of distance expressed in metres in a floating point format.

FrictionValue.title: FrictionValue
FrictionValue.description: A measured or calculated value of road surface friction.

friction.title: friction
friction.description: Friction, usually a value between 0 and 1.

FuelTypeEnum.title: FuelTypeEnum
FuelTypeEnum.description: Type of fuel used by a vehicle.

GenericPublication.title: GenericPublication
GenericPublication.description: A publication used to make level B extensions at the publication level.

genericPublicationName.title: genericPublicationName
genericPublicationName.description: The name of the generic publication.

GlobalReference.title: GlobalReference
GlobalReference.description: A versioned reference to an object that may be in another publication from another publisher.

externalPublicationIdentifier.title: externalPublicationIdentifier
externalPublicationIdentifier.description: Identifier for an external DATEX II publication

externalPublisher.title: externalPublisher
externalPublisher.description: Identifier for an external DATEX II publisher

GrossWeightCharacteristic.title: GrossWeightCharacteristic
GrossWeightCharacteristic.description: Gross weight characteristic of a vehicle.

comparisonOperator.title: comparisonOperator
comparisonOperator.description: The operator to be used in the vehicle characteristic comparison operation.

grossVehicleWeight.title: grossVehicleWeight
grossVehicleWeight.description: The gross weight of the vehicle and its load, including any trailers.

typeOfWeight.title: typeOfWeight
typeOfWeight.description: The meaning of the weight value

GroupOfVehiclesInvolved.title: GroupOfVehiclesInvolved
GroupOfVehiclesInvolved.description: Group of the vehicles involved having common characteristics and/or status.

numberOfVehicles.title: numberOfVehicles
numberOfVehicles.description: The number of vehicles of this group that are involved.

chemicalName.title: chemicalName
chemicalName.description: The chemical name of the hazardous substance carried by the vehicle.

dangerousGoodsFlashPoint.title: dangerousGoodsFlashPoint
dangerousGoodsFlashPoint.description: The temperature at which the vapour from a hazardous substance will ignite in air.

dangerousGoodsRegulations.title: dangerousGoodsRegulations
dangerousGoodsRegulations.description: The code defining the regulations, international or national, applicable for a means of transport.

hazardCodeVersionNumber.title: hazardCodeVersionNumber
hazardCodeVersionNumber.description: The version/revision number of date of issuance of the hazardous material code used.

hazardSubstanceItemPageNumber.title: hazardSubstanceItemPageNumber
hazardSubstanceItemPageNumber.description: A number giving additional hazard code classification of a goods item within the applicable dangerous goods regulation.

tremCardNumber.title: tremCardNumber
tremCardNumber.description: The identification of a transport emergency card giving advice for emergency actions.

undgNumber.title: undgNumber
undgNumber.description: A unique serial number assigned within the United Nations to substances and articles contained in a list of the dangerous goods most commonly carried.

volumeOfDangerousGoods.title: volumeOfDangerousGoods
volumeOfDangerousGoods.description: The volume of dangerous goods on the vehicle(s) reported in a traffic/travel situation.

weightOfDangerousGoods.title: weightOfDangerousGoods
weightOfDangerousGoods.description: The weight of dangerous goods on the vehicle(s) reported in a traffic/travel situation.

HeaderInformation.title: HeaderInformation
HeaderInformation.description: Management information relating to the data contained within a publication.

confidentiality.title: confidentiality
confidentiality.description: The extent to which the related information may be circulated, according to the recipient type.

informationStatus.title: informationStatus
informationStatus.description: The status of the related information (real, test, exercise ....).

HeaviestAxleWeightCharacteristic.title: HeaviestAxleWeightCharacteristic
HeaviestAxleWeightCharacteristic.description: Weight characteristic of the heaviest axle on the vehicle.

comparisonOperator.title: comparisonOperator
comparisonOperator.description: The operator to be used in the vehicle characteristic comparison operation.

heaviestAxleWeight.title: heaviestAxleWeight
heaviestAxleWeight.description: The weight of the heaviest axle on the vehicle.

Hectopascal.title: Hectopascal
Hectopascal.description: A measure of pressure defined in hectopascal.

comparisonOperator.title: comparisonOperator
comparisonOperator.description: The operator to be used in the vehicle characteristic comparison operation.

vehicleHeight.title: vehicleHeight
vehicleHeight.description: The height of the highest part, excluding antennae, of an individual vehicle above the road surface, in metres.

relativeHumidity.title: relativeHumidity
relativeHumidity.description: The amount of water vapour in the air, as a percentage of the amount of water vapour in saturated air at the same temperature and at atmospheric pressure. The measurement is taken between 1.5 and 2 m above the ground and behind a meteorological screen.

InformationDeliveryServicesEnum.title: InformationDeliveryServicesEnum
InformationDeliveryServicesEnum.description: List of service channels or devices on which information or data exchanged can be delivered.

InformationStatusEnum.title: InformationStatusEnum
InformationStatusEnum.description: Status of the related information (i.e. real, test or exercise).

InstanceOfDayEnum.title: InstanceOfDayEnum
InstanceOfDayEnum.description: Instances of a day of the week in a month

InstanceOfDayWithinMonth.title: InstanceOfDayWithinMonth
InstanceOfDayWithinMonth.description: Specification of periods defined by the instance of a specific weekday within a month (e.g. 3rd Tuesday in May)

applicableInstanceOfDayWithinMonth.title: applicableInstanceOfDayWithinMonth
applicableInstanceOfDayWithinMonth.description: The specified integer instance of the specified applicable day within a month.

IntegerMetreDistanceValue.title: IntegerMetreDistanceValue
IntegerMetreDistanceValue.description: A measured or calculated value of distance in whole metres.

integerMetreDistance.title: integerMetreDistance
integerMetreDistance.description: A value of distance expressed in metres in a non-negative integer format.

IntensityKilogramsPerSquareMetre.title: IntensityKilogramsPerSquareMetre
IntensityKilogramsPerSquareMetre.description: A measure of the quantity of application of a substance to an area defined in kilograms per square metre.

IntensityMillimetresPerHour.title: IntensityMillimetresPerHour
IntensityMillimetresPerHour.description: A measure of precipitation intensity defined in millimetres per hour.

InternationalIdentifier.title: InternationalIdentifier
InternationalIdentifier.description: An identifier/name whose range is specific to the particular country.

nationalIdentifier.title: nationalIdentifier
nationalIdentifier.description: Identifier or name unique within the specified country.

KilogramsConcentrationValue.title: KilogramsConcentrationValue
KilogramsConcentrationValue.description: A measured or calculated value of concentration of a substance in kilograms per unit volume.

kilogramsConcentration.title: kilogramsConcentration
kilogramsConcentration.description: A value defining the amount of a substance in a given volume (concentration) expressed in kilograms per cubic metre.

KilometresPerHour.title: KilometresPerHour
KilometresPerHour.description: A measure of speed defined in kilometres per hour.

Language.title: Language
Language.description: A language datatype, identifies a specified language by an ISO 639-1 2-alpha code.

comparisonOperator.title: comparisonOperator
comparisonOperator.description: The operator to be used in the vehicle characteristic comparison operation.

vehicleLength.title: vehicleLength
vehicleLength.description: The overall distance between the front and back of an individual vehicle, including the length of any trailers, couplings, embedded features etc.

LoadTypeEnum.title: LoadTypeEnum
LoadTypeEnum.description: Types of load carried by a vehicle.

LongString.title: LongString
LongString.description: A character string with no specified length limit, whose value space is the set of finite-length sequences of characters. Every character has a corresponding Universal Character Set code point (as defined in ISO/IEC 10646), which is an integer.

LowEmissionLevelEnum.title: LowEmissionLevelEnum
LowEmissionLevelEnum.description: The emission level of a vehicle.

MetresAsFloat.title: MetresAsFloat
MetresAsFloat.description: A measure of distance defined in metres in a floating point format.

MetresAsNonNegativeInteger.title: MetresAsNonNegativeInteger
MetresAsNonNegativeInteger.description: A measure of distance defined in metres in a non negative integer format.

MetresPerSecond.title: MetresPerSecond
MetresPerSecond.description: A measure of speed defined in metres per second.

MicrogramsConcentrationValue.title: MicrogramsConcentrationValue
MicrogramsConcentrationValue.description: A measured or calculated value of concentration of a substance in micrograms per unit volume.

microgramsConcentration.title: microgramsConcentration
microgramsConcentration.description: A value of the amount of a substance in a given volume (concentration) expressed in µg/m3 (micrograms/cubic metre).

MonthOfYearEnum.title: MonthOfYearEnum
MonthOfYearEnum.description: A list of the months of the year.

MultilingualString.title: MultilingualString
MultilingualString.description: A multilingual string, whereby the same text may be expressed in more than one language.

NamedArea.title: NamedArea
NamedArea.description: An abstract hook class to hook in a model for a named area.

NonNegativeInteger.title: NonNegativeInteger
NonNegativeInteger.description: An integer number whose value space is the set {0, 1, 2, ..., 2147483645, 2147483646, 2147483647}.

NumberOfAxlesCharacteristic.title: NumberOfAxlesCharacteristic
NumberOfAxlesCharacteristic.description: Number of axles characteristic of a vehicle.

comparisonOperator.title: comparisonOperator
comparisonOperator.description: The operator to be used in the vehicle characteristic comparison operation.

numberOfAxles.title: numberOfAxles
numberOfAxles.description: The total number of axles of an individual vehicle.

OverallPeriod.title: OverallPeriod
OverallPeriod.description: A continuous or discontinuous period of validity defined by overall bounding start and end times and the possible intersection of valid periods (potentially recurring) with the complement of exception periods (also potentially recurring).

overallStartTime.title: overallStartTime
overallStartTime.description: Start of bounding period of validity defined by date and time.

overallEndTime.title: overallEndTime
overallEndTime.description: End of bounding period of validity defined by date and time.

validPeriod.title: validPeriod
validPeriod.description: A single time period, a recurring time period or a set of different recurring time periods during which validity is true.

exceptionPeriod.title: exceptionPeriod
exceptionPeriod.description: A single time period, a recurring time period or a set of different recurring time periods during which validity is false.

PayloadPublication.title: PayloadPublication
PayloadPublication.description: A payload publication of traffic related information or associated management information created at a specific point in time that can be exchanged via a DATEX II interface.

lang.title: lang
lang.description: The default language used throughout the payload publication.

feedDescription.title: feedDescription
feedDescription.description: A description of the information which is to be found in the publications originating from the particular feed (URL).

feedType.title: feedType
feedType.description: A classification of the information which is to be found in the publications originating from the particular feed.

publicationTime.title: publicationTime
publicationTime.description: Date/time at which the payload publication was created.

PercentageValue.title: PercentageValue
PercentageValue.description: A measured or calculated value expressed as a percentage.

percentage.title: percentage
percentage.description: A value expressed as a percentage.

Period.title: Period
Period.description: A continuous time period or a set of discontinuous time periods defined by the intersection of a set of criteria all within an overall delimiting interval.

recurringTimePeriodOfDay.title: recurringTimePeriodOfDay
recurringTimePeriodOfDay.description: A recurring period of a day.

recurringDayWeekMonthPeriod.title: recurringDayWeekMonthPeriod
recurringDayWeekMonthPeriod.description: A recurring period defined in terms of days of the week, weeks of the month and months of the year.

recurringSpecialDay.title: recurringSpecialDay
recurringSpecialDay.description: A recurring period in terms of special days.

PollutantTypeEnum.title: PollutantTypeEnum
PollutantTypeEnum.description: Types of pollutant that can be measured in the atmosphere.

pollutantType.title: pollutantType
pollutantType.description: The type of pollutant in the air.

pollutantConcentration.title: pollutantConcentration
pollutantConcentration.description: The average concentration of the pollutant in the air.

precipitationType.title: precipitationType
precipitationType.description: The type of precipitation which is affecting the driving conditions.

precipitationIntensityGrade.title: precipitationIntensityGrade
precipitationIntensityGrade.description: The intensity of precipitation expressed by enumerated value,

precipitationIntensity.title: precipitationIntensity
precipitationIntensity.description: The height of the precipitation received per unit time.

depositionDepth.title: depositionDepth
depositionDepth.description: The equivalent depth of the water layer resulting from precipitation or deposition on a non-porous horizontal surface. Non liquid precipitation is considered as melted in water form.

PrecipitationIntensityValue.title: PrecipitationIntensityValue
PrecipitationIntensityValue.description: A measured or calculated value of the accumulation rate of precipitation.

millimetresPerHourIntensity.title: millimetresPerHourIntensity
millimetresPerHourIntensity.description: A value of precipitation intensity expressed in units of millimetres per hour.

PressureValue.title: PressureValue
PressureValue.description: A measured or calculated value of atmospheric pressure.

PublicHoliday.title: PublicHoliday
PublicHoliday.description: Specification of a specific public holiday in case specialDayType is set to 'publicHoliday'.

publicHolidayName.title: publicHolidayName
publicHolidayName.description: Specification of a specific public holiday by its name.

RoadSurfaceConditionMeasurements.title: RoadSurfaceConditionMeasurements
RoadSurfaceConditionMeasurements.description: Measurements of the road surface condition which relate specifically to the weather.

temperatureBelowOrAboveRoadSurface.title: temperatureBelowOrAboveRoadSurface
temperatureBelowOrAboveRoadSurface.description: Temperature measurements below or above the road surface.

roadSurfaceTemperature.title: roadSurfaceTemperature
roadSurfaceTemperature.description: The temperature measured on the road surface.

protectionTemperature.title: protectionTemperature
protectionTemperature.description: The road surface temperature down to which the surface is protected from freezing.

deIcingApplicationRate.title: deIcingApplicationRate
deIcingApplicationRate.description: Indicates the rate at which de-icing agents have been applied to the specified road.

deIcingConcentration.title: deIcingConcentration
deIcingConcentration.description: Indicates the concentration of de-icing agent present in surface water on the specified road.

friction.title: friction
friction.description: The friction value of the road.

depthOfSnow.title: depthOfSnow
depthOfSnow.description: The depth of snow recorded on the road surface.

waterFilmThickness.title: waterFilmThickness
waterFilmThickness.description: The depth of standing water to be found on the road surface.

iceLayerThickness.title: iceLayerThickness
iceLayerThickness.description: The depth of ice to be found on the road surface.

icePercentage.title: icePercentage
icePercentage.description: The percentage of ice in the water.

Source.title: Source
Source.description: Details of the source from which the information was obtained.

sourceCountry.title: sourceCountry
sourceCountry.description: EN ISO 3166-1 two-character country code of the source of the information.

sourceIdentification.title: sourceIdentification
sourceIdentification.description: Language independent textual code or identifier for the organisation or the equipment that has produced the information.

sourceName.title: sourceName
sourceName.description: The name of the organisation which has produced the information relating to this version of the information.

sourceType.title: sourceType
sourceType.description: Information about the technology used for measuring the data or the method used for obtaining qualitative descriptions relating to this version of the information.

reliable.title: reliable
reliable.description: An indication as to whether the source deems the associated information to be reliable/correct. "True" indicates it is deemed reliable.

SourceTypeEnum.title: SourceTypeEnum
SourceTypeEnum.description: Type of sources from which situation information may be derived.

SpecialDay.title: SpecialDay
SpecialDay.description: Specification of a special type of day, possibly also a public holiday. Can be country or region specific.

intersectWithApplicableDays.title: intersectWithApplicableDays
intersectWithApplicableDays.description: When true, the period is the intersection of applicable days and this special day. When false, the period is the union of applicable days and this special day.

specialDayType.title: specialDayType
specialDayType.description: Specification of a special day, for example schoolDay, publicHoliday, ...

publicEvent.title: publicEvent
publicEvent.description: Type of public event on this special day.

SpecialDayTypeEnum.title: SpecialDayTypeEnum
SpecialDayTypeEnum.description: Collection of special types of days.

SpeedValue.title: SpeedValue
SpeedValue.description: A measured or calculated value of speed.

speed.title: speed
speed.description: A value of speed expressed in kilometres per hour.

String.title: String
String.description: A character string whose value space is the set of finite-length sequences of characters. Every character has a corresponding Universal Character Set code point (as defined in ISO/IEC 10646), which is an integer.

airTemperature.title: airTemperature
airTemperature.description: The air temperature measured in the shade between 1.5 and 2 metres above ground level.

dewPointTemperature.title: dewPointTemperature
dewPointTemperature.description: The temperature to which the air would have to cool (at constant pressure and water vapour content) in order to reach saturation.

maximumTemperature.title: maximumTemperature
maximumTemperature.description: The maximum temperature during the forecast or measurement period.

minimumTemperature.title: minimumTemperature
minimumTemperature.description: The minimum temperature during the forecast or measurement period.

TemperatureBelowOrAboveRoadSurface.title: TemperatureBelowOrAboveRoadSurface
TemperatureBelowOrAboveRoadSurface.description: Mesurement of temperature below or above the road surface.

heightBelowOrAboveRoadSurface.title: heightBelowOrAboveRoadSurface
heightBelowOrAboveRoadSurface.description: The height of the measurement either below (negative value) or above (positive value) the road surface.

temperatureBelowOrAboveRoadSurface.title: temperatureBelowOrAboveRoadSurface
temperatureBelowOrAboveRoadSurface.description: The temperature measured at the specified height below or above the road surface.

TemperatureCelsius.title: TemperatureCelsius
TemperatureCelsius.description: A measure of temperature defined in degrees Celsius.

TemperatureValue.title: TemperatureValue
TemperatureValue.description: A measured or calculated value of temperature.

temperature.title: temperature
temperature.description: A value of temperature expressed in degrees Celsius.

Time.title: Time
Time.description: An instant of time that recurs every day. The value space of time is the space of time of day values as defined in § 5.3 of [ISO 8601]. Specifically, it is a set of zero-duration daily time instances.

TimePeriodOfDay.title: TimePeriodOfDay
TimePeriodOfDay.description: Specification of a continuous period of time within a 24 hour period.

TimePrecisionEnum.title: TimePrecisionEnum
TimePrecisionEnum.description: List of precisions to which times can be given.

Tonnes.title: Tonnes
Tonnes.description: A measure of weight defined in metric tonnes.

TrafficTrendTypeEnum.title: TrafficTrendTypeEnum
TrafficTrendTypeEnum.description: List of terms used to describe the trend in traffic conditions.

Url.title: Url
Url.description: A Uniform Resource Locator (URL) address comprising a compact string of characters for a resource available on the Internet.

UrlLink.title: UrlLink
UrlLink.description: Details of a Uniform Resource Locator (URL) address pointing to a resource available on the Internet from where further relevant information may be obtained.

urlLinkAddress.title: urlLinkAddress
urlLinkAddress.description: A Uniform Resource Locator (URL) address pointing to a resource available on the Internet from where further relevant information may be obtained.

urlLinkDescription.title: urlLinkDescription
urlLinkDescription.description: Description of the relevant information available on the Internet from the URL link.

urlLinkType.title: urlLinkType
urlLinkType.description: Details of the type of relevant information available on the Internet from the URL link.

Validity.title: Validity
Validity.description: Specification of validity, either explicitly or by a validity time period specification which may be discontinuous.

validityStatus.title: validityStatus
validityStatus.description: Specification of validity, either explicitly overriding the validity time specification or confirming it.

overrunning.title: overrunning
overrunning.description: The activity or action described by the SituationRecord is still in progress, overrunning its planned duration as indicated in a previous version of this record or even in current version.

validityTimeSpecification.title: validityTimeSpecification
validityTimeSpecification.description: A specification of periods of validity defined by overall bounding start and end times and the possible intersection of valid periods with exception periods (exception periods overriding valid periods).

ValidityStatusEnum.title: ValidityStatusEnum
ValidityStatusEnum.description: Values of validity status that can be assigned to a described event, action or item.

anonymizedVehicleReference.title: anonymizedVehicleReference
anonymizedVehicleReference.description: A reference for a vehicle derived from vehicle properties such as registration number but encoded so that it does not allow a human to identify the vehicle directly from the encoded value

vehicleCountryOfOrigin.title: vehicleCountryOfOrigin
vehicleCountryOfOrigin.description: Specification of the country in which the vehicle is registered. The code is the 2-alpha code as given in EN ISO 3166-1 which is updated by the ISO 3166 Maintenance Agency.

vehicleIdentifier.title: vehicleIdentifier
vehicleIdentifier.description: A vehicle identification number (VIN) comprising 17 characters that is based on either ISO 3779 or ISO 3780 and uniquely identifies the individual vehicle. This is normally securely attached to the vehicle chassis.

vehicleManufacturer.title: vehicleManufacturer
vehicleManufacturer.description: Indicates the stated manufacturer of the vehicle, e.g. Ford.

vehicleModel.title: vehicleModel
vehicleModel.description: Indicates the model (or range name) of the vehicle, e.g. Mondeo.

vehicleRegistrationPlateIdentifier.title: vehicleRegistrationPlateIdentifier
vehicleRegistrationPlateIdentifier.description: An identifier or code displayed on a vehicle registration plate attached to the vehicle used for official identification purposes. The registration identifier is numeric or alphanumeric and is unique within the issuing authority's region.

axleSpacingOnVehicle.title: axleSpacingOnVehicle
axleSpacingOnVehicle.description: The spacing between axles on the vehicles.

specificAxleWeight.title: specificAxleWeight
specificAxleWeight.description: The weight details relating to a specific axle on the vehicle.

hazardousGoodsAssociatedWithVehicle.title: hazardousGoodsAssociatedWithVehicle
hazardousGoodsAssociatedWithVehicle.description: Details of hazardous goods carried by the vehicle.

VehicleCharacteristics.title: VehicleCharacteristics
VehicleCharacteristics.description: The characteristics of a vehicle, e.g. lorry of gross weight greater than 30 tonnes.

fuelType.title: fuelType
fuelType.description: The type of fuel used by the vehicle.

loadType.title: loadType
loadType.description: The type of load carried by the vehicle, especially in respect of hazardous loads.

vehicleEquipment.title: vehicleEquipment
vehicleEquipment.description: The type of equipment in use or on board the vehicle.

vehicleUsage.title: vehicleUsage
vehicleUsage.description: The type of usage of the vehicle (i.e. for what purpose is the vehicle being used).

yearOfFirstRegistration.title: yearOfFirstRegistration
yearOfFirstRegistration.description: Year of first registration of the vehicle

VehicleEquipmentEnum.title: VehicleEquipmentEnum
VehicleEquipmentEnum.description: Types of vehicle equipment in use or on board.

VehicleFlowValue.title: VehicleFlowValue
VehicleFlowValue.description: A measured or calculated value of the flow rate of vehicles.

vehicleFlowRate.title: vehicleFlowRate
vehicleFlowRate.description: A value of vehicle flow rate expressed in vehicles per hour.

VehicleUsageEnum.title: VehicleUsageEnum
VehicleUsageEnum.description: Types of usage of a vehicle.

VersionedReference.title: VersionedReference
VersionedReference.description: A reference to an identifiable version managed object where the combination of the identifier and version is unique. It comprises an identifier (e.g. GUID), a version (NonNegativeInteger) and a string identifying the class of the referenced object.

minimumVisibilityDistance.title: minimumVisibilityDistance
minimumVisibilityDistance.description: The minimum distance, measured or estimated, beyond which drivers may be unable to clearly see a vehicle or an obstacle.

WeatherRelatedRoadConditionTypeEnum.title: WeatherRelatedRoadConditionTypeEnum
WeatherRelatedRoadConditionTypeEnum.description: Types of road surface conditions which are related to the weather.

WeightTypeEnum.title: WeightTypeEnum
WeightTypeEnum.description: Type of weight - describing the meaning of a vehicle weight value

comparisonOperator.title: comparisonOperator
comparisonOperator.description: The operator to be used in the vehicle characteristic comparison operation.

vehicleWidth.title: vehicleWidth
vehicleWidth.description: The maximum width of an individual vehicle, including any features embedded or fixed on it, in metres.

windMeasurementHeight.title: windMeasurementHeight
windMeasurementHeight.description: The height in metres above the road surface at which the wind is measured.

windSpeed.title: windSpeed
windSpeed.description: The wind speed averaged over at least 10 minutes, measured at a default height of10 metres (meteorological standard) above the road surface, unless measurement height is specified.

maximumWindSpeed.title: maximumWindSpeed
maximumWindSpeed.description: The maximum wind speed in a measurement period of 10 minutes.

windDirectionBearing.title: windDirectionBearing
windDirectionBearing.description: The average direction from which the wind blows, in terms of a bearing measured in degrees (0 - 359).

maximumWindDirectionBearing.title: maximumWindDirectionBearing
maximumWindDirectionBearing.description: The direction from which the maximum wind blows, in terms of a bearing measured in degrees (0 - 359).

windDirectionCompass.title: windDirectionCompass
windDirectionCompass.description: The average direction from which the wind blows, in terms of points of the compass.

maximumWindDirectionCompass.title: maximumWindDirectionCompass
maximumWindDirectionCompass.description: The direction from which the maximum wind blows, in terms of points of the compass.

WindSpeedValue.title: WindSpeedValue
WindSpeedValue.description: A measured or calculated value of wind speed.

windSpeed.title: windSpeed
windSpeed.description: A value of wind speed expressed in metres per second.

WinterEquipmentManagementTypeEnum.title: WinterEquipmentManagementTypeEnum
WinterEquipmentManagementTypeEnum.description: Instructions relating to the use of winter equipment.
